pr_body: ## Description This Pull request exposes the `openapi.yaml` file through the new `/openapi` endpoint. ### Changes `src/www/ui/api/Controllers/InfoController.php` `src/www/ui/api/index.php` ## How to test use the `/openapi` endpoint in postman. ##Screenshots: ![Screenshot from 2023-06-14 21-37-19](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/552719a2-0bcf-4b0d-b1fb-9c0f832c0396) Closes #2452

pr_body: ## Description Copyright info for file is exposed through `/file/upload/{UploadId}/item/{ItemId}/copyrights` endpoint ## Screenshots ![Screenshot from 2023-06-15 12-27-40](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/219ea736-9036-407b-9c0a-b643e53e7874) ## How to test Send a GET request to `/file/upload/{UploadId}/item/{ItemId}/copyrights` endpoint to see the result. Closes #2468

pr_title: feat(api): Delete Copyright for a File

pr_title: feat(api): API for updating File copyright content
pr_body: ## Description API to update File copyright is added in this PR ## How to test Send a `PUT` request to the endpoint `/file/upload/{Upload_id}/item/{Item_id}/copyright/{Copyright_hash}` with a body : ``` { "content": "New Test copyright text" } ``` ##Screenshots: - Before sending the API request: ![Screenshot from 2023-06-18 18-09-36](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/f34151a0-b24b-4c23-bc16-d05a9bbdc0dc) - The API Request: ![Screenshot from 2023-06-18 18-09-50](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/4a3b5507-044f-43ae-9bb5-7560a8c3da9b) - After the API request: ![Screenshot from 2023-06-18 18-10-01](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/2662a03e-5367-4678-ba25-f621458cdd93) closes #2468 Please consider using the closing keyword if the pull request is proposed to fix an issue already created in the repository (https://help.github.com/articles/closing-issues-using-keywords/)

pr_title: feat(api): get inactive copyright details for a file
pr_body: ## Description Inactive copyright info for file is exposed through `/file/upload/{UploadId}/item/{ItemId}/copyrights/inactive` endpoint ## Screenshots ![Screenshot from 2023-06-20 20-50-25](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/3f1717c7-5c5a-4191-b64f-5122d9da4c7a) ## How to test Send a GET request to `/file/upload/{UploadId}/item/{ItemId}/copyrights/inactive` endpoint to see the result. closes #2468

## Description API endpoint to get info for a file ## How to test Send a get request to `/file/upload/{UploadId}/item/{ItemId}/info` ## Screenshots ![image](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/87455744-0413-48cc-ba2a-8431d93d6c34) closes #2493 @shaheemazmalmmd @GMishx

pr_title: feat(api): API to return total number of copyrights for a file
pr_body: ## Description This API returns the total number of copyrights for a UploadTree ## How to test Send a `GET` request to `/file/upload/{UploadId}/item/{ItemId}/totalcopyrights` ##Screenshots ![Screenshot from 2023-06-21 22-47-51](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/d0671ea0-53bd-4e2b-97ab-0345e54a3d87) Fixes #2468 @shaheemazmalmmd Please do have a look as this was requested on priority basis.

pr_body: ## Description This endpoint provides us full conf information as a response for an Upload. ## How to test Send a GET request to `/file/upload/{UploadId}/item/{UploadId}/conf` ## Screenshots ![image](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/b9274cb7-cf7c-4770-9b39-d61966d15b95) Closes #2504
pr_review_comments:
[{'comment_id': 1258009203, 'comment_body': 'I did not author this file :smiley:', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 10, 9, 55, 24, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1258009479, 'comment_body': 'Please remove `try/catch` as discussed.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 10, 9, 55, 39, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1258010219, 'comment_body': 'Create a new Model class for the same.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 10, 9, 56, 20, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1258011982, 'comment_body': 'Please update the patch to be consistent with other endpoints.
```suggestion
  /uploads/{id}/conf:
```

The item id is not required for this endpoint to work.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 10, 9, 57, 55, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1258024534, 'comment_body': 'Use following JSON format for the same:
```json
{
  "reviewed": "Some Name",
  "footer": "Some Organization",
  "reportRel": "Some release date",
  "community": "Community name",
  "component": "Component name",
  "version": "1.2.3",
  "releaseDate": "12\\/05\\/2018",
  "sw360Link": "NA",
  "componentType": "package-url",
  "componentId": "pkg:npm\\/30-seconds-of-code@1.2.3",
  "generalAssesment": "Some assessment test",
  "gaAdditional": "NA",
  "gaRisk": "No additional information\\/violations found for the package.",
  "gaCheckbox": "unchecked,unchecked,unchecked,unchecked,unchecked,unchecked,unchecked,unchecked,unchecked",
  "spdxSelection": "checked,unchecked",
  "excludedObligations": {
    "Obligation 1": [
      "MIT",
      "GPL-3.0-only"
    ]
  },
  "department": "FOSSology Generation",
  "depNotes": "NA",
  "exportNotes": "NA",
  "copyrightNotes": "NA",
  "unifiedColumns": {"assessment":{"Assessment Summary":"on"},"compliancetasks":{"Required license compliance tasks":"on"},"acknowledgements":{"Acknowledgements":"on"},"exportrestrictions":{"Export Restrictions":"on"},"intellectualProperty":{"Patent Relevant Statements":"on"},"notes":{"Notes":"on"},"scanresults":{"Results of License Scan":"on"},"mainlicenses":{"Main Licenses":"on"},"redlicense":{"Other OSS Licenses (red) - Do not Use Licenses":"on"},"yellowlicense":{"Other OSS Licenses (yellow) - additional obligations to common rules (e.g. copyleft)":"on"},"whitelicense":{"Other OSS Licenses (white) - only common rules":"on"},"overviewwithwithoutobligations":{"Overview of All Licenses with or without Obligations":"on"},"copyrights":{"Copyrights":"on"},"copyrightsuf":{"Copyrights (User Findings)":"on"},"bulkfindings":{"Bulk Findings":"on"},"licensenf":{"Non-Functional Licenses":"on"},"irrelevantfiles":{"Irrelevant Files":"on"},"dnufiles":{"Do not use Files":"on"},"changelog":{"Clearing Protocol Change Log":"on"}},
  "globalDecision": false
}
```

Additional notes:
1. `componentType`: Use map from class \Fossology\Lib\Data\Package\ComponentType
2. `excludedObligations`: Can be an object, `null` or empty array `[]`
3. `unifiedColumns`: It is an object with key: "report conf section id" and value: "{display text, on/off}"
4. `globalDecision`: It is a boolean.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 10, 10, 9, 52, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1271788925, 'comment_body': "Container is set in parent class.

```suggestion
    parent::__construct($container);
    $this->clearingDao = $this->container->get('dao.clearing');
    $this->licenseDao = $this->container->get('dao.license');
```", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 24, 6, 7, 27, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1271789367, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
    $this->uploadDao = $this->restHelper->getUploadDao();
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 24, 6, 8, 12, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1271791580, 'comment_body': 'Please following naming convention

```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 24, 6, 11, 36, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1271793131, 'comment_body': 'Translate this data back as an array.                 - off
              example: on
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 31, 5, 42, 19, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}]

pr_body: ## Description This PR introduces an endpoint to fetch data for the customize page from admin panel THIS PR IS WIP and to be updated according to the requirements. ## How to test send a `GET` request to `localhost/repo/api/v1/customise` ## Screenshots ![Screenshot from 2023-07-04 20-50-06](https://github.com/fossology/fossology/assets/63705023/693daddd-2383-47e3-8738-f168cdbdaec9) closes #2519

```suggestion
          - boolean
        label:
          description: field label
          type: string
        group_name:
          description: group name for the field
          type: string
        group_order:
          description: group order of the field
          type: integer
        option_value:
          description: If type is 'dropdown', provide options in format op1{val1}|op2{val2}|...
          type: string

```", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 8, 8, 6, 11, 55, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'GMishx', 'type': 'User'}]
